name: In the Cards (anttihaavikko)
description:
You have a deck of tarot cards and have to place the cards on the board one by one to reach the target. By grabbing the target you slowly level up and can pick new powers to add to your cards.

You can keep going as long as you can reach the target in five moves or less and the board isn't completely filled.

Claim your spot on the online leaderboards and take on the daily challenge which presents the exact same scenario for every player each day.

Tools used
  • Unity 2021.3.8
  • JetBrains Rider 2022.1.2
  • Inkscape
  • Procreate
  • Logic Pro X
  • Uberduck
  • Coolors
